H0.text: In which town in Kent is the Shepherd Neame brewery located. Maidstone

H1.text: In which town in Kent is the Shepherd Neame brewery located. Canterbury

H2.text: In which town in Kent is the Shepherd Neame brewery located. Tunbridge Wells

H3.text: In which town in Kent is the Shepherd Neame brewery located. Faversham

A4.text: The brewery has been based in the market town of Faversham, Kent, for over 300 years.

A5.text: The brewery's headquarters are at 18 Court Street, Faversham.
